keycloak.title: Keycloak Management Console
keycloak.description: Access the Keycloak administration interface to manage users, roles, and authentication settings.
keycloak.whatIsKeycloakDesc: Keycloak is an open-source identity and access management platform. It handles user authentication, authorization, and role management for this application.

mtls.title: What is mTLS?
mtls.paragraph1: By using an mTLS key installed on your device to connect to our service, we can ensure the connection comes from you. No one else can impersonate you.
mtls.paragraph2: Likewise, you are assured that on the other end, it's us.
mtls.paragraph3: All services from Deploy App (Rasenm√§her) that you take into use encrypt their traffic with your mTLS key.

welcome.title: Get Started
welcome.description: Deploy App is your central operations hub for managing and launching all tactical systems and services.

products.title: Access Mission Apps
products.description: Access mission applications and establish secure connections through mTLS-protected channels.

credentials.title: Credentials Ready
credentials.description: Your authentication certificates are installed and verified. You can operate immediately with full access.

users.title: Control User Accounts
users.description: Control user access, assign admin roles, and remove inactive accounts to keep the roster accurate.

invite.title: Add New Operators
invite.description: Issue secure invite or QR codes to onboard new team members into your operational network.

health.title: System Status
health.description: View live system metrics and verify all services are running within mission parameters.

instructions.title: Tactical Guides
instructions.description: Access quick-reference manuals, deployment steps, and usage notes for every system in service.

onboarding.completionDesc: You're all set and ready to operate at full capacity.

login.loginDesc: Login with your certificate or enter an invite code

approveUsers.title: Approve Users
approveUsers.usersAwaiting: Users awaiting approval are displayed here.
approveUsers.step1: Users in the waiting room will have an
approveUsers.step1End: and QR code displayed on their screen.
approveUsers.step2: Click on a user below to open the approval dialog, or scan their QR code.
approveUsers.step3: Enter their approval code and click
approveUsers.pointCamera: Point your camera at the QR code from the user's waiting room screen. The approval will be detected automatically.
approveUsers.cameraPreview: Camera preview will appear here once started.
approveUsers.enterApprovalCode: Enter the user's approval code and press Approve.
approveUsers.noCallsignFound: No callsign found. Please log in.
approveUsers.cameraAccessFailed: Failed to access camera. Please check permissions.

addUsers.title: Add Users with Invite Code
addUsers.subtitle: One invite code can be used multiple times. Click on a code to view its QR code and share it with users. Create a new code only if needed.
addUsers.subtitleHighlight: One invite code can be used multiple times.
addUsers.noCallsign: No callsign found. Please log in.
addUsers.createModalDescription: One invite code can be used by multiple users
addUsers.createModalWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è One invite code can be used by multiple users
addUsers.createModalText: You only need to create a new code if:
addUsers.createModalReason1: You've deleted or deactivated your previous code
addUsers.createModalReason2: You want separate codes for different groups
addUsers.createModalTip: Tip: Reuse existing active codes instead of creating new ones

walkthrough.title: How to Add Users
walkthrough.step1Description: Click on any active invite code to view its QR code. One code can be used by multiple users - no need to create a new one each time!
walkthrough.step2Description: Show the QR code to users or share the invite link. They'll scan it to start the enrollment process.
walkthrough.step3Description: After users enter their callsign, approve them in the "Approve Users" section using their approval code or QR code.
walkthrough.managingBullet1: Deactivate codes temporarily without deleting them
walkthrough.managingBullet2: Delete codes you no longer need

messages.noCallsignError: No callsign found. Please log in.

validation.min: Callsign must be at least 3 characters
validation.max: Callsign must be at most 30 characters

mtls_fail.title: Certificate Authentication Failed
mtls_fail.description: Your mTLS certificate could not be verified. Please ensure you have installed the correct certificate and try again.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.description: You do not have permission to access this resource.

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

default.title: Something went wrong!
default.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

error.contactSupport: If you need further assistance, please contact support.

home.description: Access your tactical services and tools. Select a service below to get started.
home.authRequired: You must be authenticated to access services. Please log in.

dialog.leaveDescription: You are about to open an external page. Are you sure you want to continue?

steps.show: Show this QR code to your user.
steps.alternative: Alternatively, press the Copy invite link button above,
steps.copyButtonHint: and paste & send the link to the user you want to enroll.
steps.print: Print & Post the exported PDF on a physical poster.
steps.printHint: so soldiers can scan it during onboarding.
steps.callsign: Via the QR code or the link, your user can set their callsign.
steps.waiting: After that, they are in the Waiting Room.
steps.approve: Approve your user by one of the methods below.

method1.title: Method 1: QR Code Scanning
method1.description: Ask the user to show you their approval code on their Waiting Room screen. Use your device's camera or a QR code scanner app to scan the QR code. The approval will be processed automatically.

method2.title: Method 2: Approval Code
method2.description: Take the approval code from their Waiting Room screen and use it in the "Approve Users" view.

method3.title: Method 3: Link Approval
method3.description: Ask them to provide you the approval link from their Waiting Room screen, which you can click to approve them directly.

pdf.title: Deploy App

steps.step1: Point your camera at the QR code above
steps.step2: Or visit the link and follow the enrollment process

pdf.downloadFailure: Failed to export PDF. Please try again.

manageUsers.title: Manage Users
manageUsers.noCallsignFound: No callsign found. Please log in.

walkthrough.title: How to Manage Users
walkthrough.description: Quick guide to managing your team
walkthrough.promotingDesc: Click on any user to promote fighters to admins or demote admins to fighters. Promoted users gain the same administrative rights as you.
walkthrough.removingDesc: Removing users will revoke their access to this Deploy App and all connected services. They will no longer be able to connect to your situation awareness service.
walkthrough.note1: You cannot remove or demote yourself
walkthrough.note2: At least one admin must exist at all times

tooltips.cannotRemove: You cannot remove yourself from this application

promote.title: Promote User
promote.description: Are you sure you want to promote {{callsign}} to administrator? They will have full access to user management tools.

demote.title: Demote User
demote.description: Are you sure you want to demote {{callsign}} from administrator to fighter? They will lose access to user management tools.

remove.title: Remove User
remove.description: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to remove {{callsign}}?

messages.noCandidateFound: No callsign found. Please log in.
messages.cannotDemoteOwn: You cannot demote your own account
messages.cannotDeleteOwn: You cannot delete your own account
messages.cannotDeleteLastAdmin: Cannot delete the last admin. At least one admin must exist.
messages.cannotSelectSelf: You cannot select your own account for bulk actions.

bulkConfirm.title: Confirm Bulk Action
bulkConfirm.promoteDescription: You are about to promote {{count}} user(s) to admin. Continue?
bulkConfirm.demoteDescription: You are about to demote {{count}} user(s) from admin. Continue?
bulkConfirm.removeDescription: You are about to remove {{count}} user(s). This cannot be undone. Continue?

mtlsInstall.title: Download & Install Your Key
mtlsInstall.description: Install your mTLS certificate to securely access all services. This ensures only you can connect with your identity.
mtlsInstall.whatIsDesc: By using an mTLS key installed on your device to connect to our service, we can ensure the connection comes from you. No one else can impersonate you.
mtlsInstall.downloadFailed: Failed to download certificate. Please try again.

steps.1: Download your certificate using the button below
steps.2: Double-click the .pfx file to open the Certificate Import Wizard
steps.3: Select 'Current User' or 'Local Machine' (Current User is recommended)
steps.4: Choose 'Automatically select the certificate store based on the type of certificate'
steps.7: Use the 'Navigate with your key' button to access services

notes.1: The certificate will be stored in your Windows Certificate Store
notes.2: You may need to restart your browser for the certificate to be recognized

steps.1: Download your certificate using the button below
steps.2: Double-click the .pfx file to open Keychain Access
steps.3: When prompted, enter your callsign as the password
steps.4: Verify the certificate was added to your login Keychain
steps.5: Use the 'Navigate with your key' button to access services

notes.1: macOS will automatically install the certificate to Keychain
notes.2: If prompted about trust, select 'Always Trust' for this application

steps.1: Download your certificate using the button below
steps.2: For Firefox: Settings ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Certificates ‚Üí View Certificates ‚Üí Import
steps.3: For Chrome: Settings ‚Üí Privacy and security ‚Üí Security ‚Üí Manage certificates ‚Üí Import
steps.4: Use the 'Navigate with your key' button to access services

notes.1: The exact process depends on your Linux distribution and browser
notes.2: You may need to restart your browser after importing the certificate

steps.1: Download your certificate using the button below
steps.2: Open Settings ‚Üí Security ‚Üí Encryption and credentials ‚Üí Install a certificate
steps.4: When prompted, enter your callsign as the password
steps.5: Name the certificate and confirm installation
steps.6: Use the 'Navigate with your key' button to access services

notes.1: Android must be running version 4.4 or later
notes.2: The certificate will be added to your system's trusted certificate store

steps.1: Download your certificate using the button below
steps.2: Tap the file to open it, then tap 'Allow' to install
steps.3: Go to Settings ‚Üí General ‚Üí VPN & Device Management
steps.5: When prompted, enter your callsign as the password
steps.7: Use the 'Navigate with your key' button to access services

notes.1: iOS requires the certificate to be trusted before use
notes.2: You may see a prompt asking to allow certificate installation

product.remoteUnavailable: Remote app unavailable for "{{shortname}}". Please try again later.

waitingRoom.title: You are in the Waiting Room!
waitingRoom.description: You are awaiting your administrator to approve you to the services. Copy and send your Admin your Approval Link.
waitingRoom.copyButton: Copy approval link for your administrator
waitingRoom.instructionsText: You may approve your user either by taking the approval code from the Waiting Room screen, by asking them to provide the approval code as a link, or by entering their approval code in the ‚ÄúApprove Users‚Äù view.

adminTools.title: Admin Console
adminTools.description: Manage your team, users, and external services from a central location.
adminTools.userManagementDesc: Approve new users, manage team roles, and control access to your services.
adminTools.externalServicesDesc: Access and manage your tactical and battle-log servers.
adminTools.approveUsersDesc: Review and approve new user registrations
adminTools.addUsersDesc: Create and manage invite codes for new users
adminTools.blServerDesc: Manage Battle Log and integration services
adminTools.help1: User Management - Approve, promote, demote, or remove users
adminTools.help2: Invite Codes - Generate and manage user invite codes
adminTools.help3: Keycloak - Configure authentication and identity management
adminTools.help4: External Services - Access TAK and Business Logic servers

feedbackForm.description: Let us know what you think. Your feedback helps improve the app.
